section_1_desc: Buy and stake $SPONGE using the button above and start earning rewards today. Spongers will gain tokens by staking $SPONGE before the claim date.
section_3_subdesc_1: Install MetaMask, Trust Wallet, or any other suitable crypto wallet from the App Store or Google Play. Desktop users can install the Chrome extension from MetaMask.io.
section_3_subdesc_2: To buy $SPONGE, you’ll need ETH in your wallet to swap. Buy ETH directly in MetaMask, transfer from another wallet, or buy on an exchange and withdraw it to your wallet. Use the ERC-20 network.
section_3_subdesc_3: You can connect to Uniswap directly above. We’ve embedded Uniswap on Sponge.vip to save you a couple of steps and take you straight to the correct pair to buy $SPONGE. If using your own browser, make sure it’s the official Uniswap site, select token, and paste the official $SPONGE token address: 0x25722Cd432d02895d9BE45f5dEB60fc479c8781E
section_3_subdesc_4: Once you have ETH in your wallet, swap your desired amount for $SPONGE. Make sure you have enough ETH left over to cover gas fees. Review the transaction details and confirm. You’re now absorbing the damp!
disclaimer_desc: $Sponge V2 has no association with Nickelodeon or their creation SpongeBob SquarePants. This token is simply paying homage to a meme we all love and recognise. $SPONGEV2 is a meme coin with no intrinsic value or expectation of financial return. There is no formal team. The Sponge ecosystem may offer P2E aspects, however the coin is intended for entertainment purposes only.
airdrop_desc: Join our Discord community and complete the quick and easy steps in the #airdrop-signup channel!
tokenomics_li_8: Earn V2 Tokens In P2E Game
roadmap_desc: The ultimate goal of $SPONGE is to soak up liquidity from the competition!  We’re absorbing all the damp.
claim_desc: Connect your wallet in order to see any $SPONGE tokens that you may be able to claim. Your claimable balance will be updated on a weekly basis.
connect_to_viewpoint: Connect wallet to view your points
sticky_message: To be eligible for the $SPONGE airdrop, you must first complete the tasks outlined in Discord. Make sure you read the rules in the #airdrop-signup channel!
quote_comparison_desc: X Routing chooses the best route to place an order through different CEXS/DEXs. We compare prices based on Liquid Providers' best liquidity pools, splitting orders, considering asset prices, slippage, and network gas fees.
leader_para: The $SPONGE season one airdrop is in full swing. You can earn points by holding and trading $SPONGE. The higher the volume, the more $SPONGE you will be rewarded!
exploring_des: Your wallet is the gateway to all things Ethereum, the magical technology that makes it possible to explore Web3.
airdrop_para: To be eligible for the $SPONGE airdrop, you MUST complete the following steps:
airdrop_step3: Open the form and connect your accounts
airdrop_para2: The amount of $SPONGE you earn from the airdrop will be determined by the criteria detailed in the #airdrop-signup channel in Discord.
airdrop_para3: X Routing chooses the best route to place an order through different CEXS/DEXs. We compare prices based on Liquid Providers' best liquidity pools, splitting orders, considering asset prices, slippage, and network gas fees.
h_point: Holding Points. Get points for the amount of $SPONGE you have in your wallet
t_point: Trading Points. Get points for your trading volume on Uniswap
total_point: Total Points. Your combined trading and holding points. Total points will be converted into $SPONGE for the airdrop
sticky_home: $SPONGE staking is coming 1st November 2023! It's not too late to absorb the damp
stake_title: SPONGE V1 STAKING DASHBOARD - CLOSURE NOTICE
stake_desc: Due to the launch of Sponge V2, Sponge V1 staking is now shut down meaning all staking functionality has moved to the Sponge V2 staking dashboard. If you still have Sponge V1 tokens staked then this dashboard will continue operating in the short term but will not be maintained. You are advised to withdraw all staked tokens and claim all rewards ASAP! Once you have done this you can head to Sponge V2 and stake your V1 tokens to continue earning rewards!
stake_transction_info: {{stakeAmount}} $SPONGE tokens will be staked once the transaction completes
stake_view_transaction_info: Please click on the View Transaction button for more details.
stake_waiting_approve: In order to stake $SPONGE, you first need to authorize us to access the $SPONGE in your wallet
transction_info_stake: {{baseToken}} tokens will be purchased and staked once the transaction is confirmed.
transction_info_stake_success: {{baseToken}} tokens have now been staked! Check the dashboard for details.
claim_success: Your tokens have been claimed successfully.
waiting_confirm_stake: In order to buy and stake your $SPONGE, please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
stake_waiting_confirm: In order to stake $SPONGE, please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
stake_popup_info: Unclaimed $SPONGE that was bought using ETH or ERC-20 USDT can be staked now. Staking for $SPONGE that was bought using BNB or USDT (BEP-20) can be staked once the presale ends. Please note that all early staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
pool_share: $SPONGE staking rewards are distributed at a rate of 4.75 $SPONGE per ETH block. Your percentage of the pool will determine what percentage of the 4.75 $SPONGE tokens you receive.
claim_not_live: U can get ur damp sponge wen staking has been live
enterAmount: Enter amount of tokens to stake
just_claim: Just want to claim without staking? Click here
how_to_para1: Connect your wallet to check the amount of $SPONGE you have available to stake. Don’t have enough tokens to stake? Click the BUY NOW button in the header to purchase some $SPONGE. Once you have $SPONGE, head to the dashboard and choose your stake amount and lock period to get staking.
how_to_para2: The longer you lock your tokens for, the bigger the multiplier and the more $SPONGE you will earn! Your staked tokens will be available to withdraw once the lock period has expired and you can claim your rewards at any time. Rewards are calculated based on your portion of the staking pool combined with the current rewards percentage.
wintdraw_date: You can withdraw your tokens from {{unstakeDate}}
wrong_chain: Wrong chain id! Please Connect to {{chainName}}
extend_info: Wanna absorb more damp? Extend your token lock for more juicy, wet, spongy goodness in the form of bigger bonuses. All staked tokens are locked for 7 days, and you can extend that to up to 90 days to triple the rate you earn spongy rewards.
sticky_stake: Absorb the damp, stake and get {{apy}}% estimated annual returns!
banner_float_text_1: Missed the Biggest Meme Coin of 2023?
wen_heading: Earn more $SPONGE in our wacky new Play-to-Earn game!
about_popup_para: Sponge V2 is the relaunch of the legendary Sponge Token, and here’s how you can get it:
about_popup_step1: You can buy direct from Uniswap. Check the DEX link on site
about_popup_step2: You can also use the ‘BUY AND STAKE’ function, on Ethereum or Polygon. Find it on the homepage
about_popup_step3: Using the ‘BUY AND STAKE’ function will automatically stake your tokens for rewards
about_popup_step4: Rewards and staked tokens will be available upon claim. Further details will be provided
about_popup_important2: Staking $SPONGE tokens locks your tokens until claim goes live. Staked tokens will earn rewards until withdrawn.
about_popup_important4: as V1 tokens will no longer be supported once V2 is launched!
stakev2_your_reward_text: Keep your patties on the socials for the Sponge V2 release date so you can absorb maximum damp!
stakev2_amout_text: Got no $SPONGE? Buy and stake now to earn rewards!
stakev2_desc: Welcome to the Sponge V2 staking dashboard! Lock your $SPONGE forever and get ready to absorb the damp with the new and improved $SPONGEV2. Check how much crispy $SPONGEV2 you’re earning below, or buy and stake more!
footer_desc: Disclaimer: Cryptocurrency may be unregulated in your jurisdiction. The value of cryptocurrencies may go down as well as up. Profits may be subject to capital gains or other taxes applicable in your jurisdiction.
buy_stake_para_1: Connect your MetaMask or Trust Wallet to the widget above for the easiest way to buy $SPONGE tokens. $SPONGE is also listed on Uniswap with this contract: 0x53df32548214f51821cf1fe4368109ac5ddea1ff
buy_stake_para_2: If you already own $SPONGE tokens, select ‘Stake Now’ to find the Staking Dashboard (only available on the Polygon network). From here, you can stake your tokens to earn rewards.
buy_stake_para_3: If you don’t have $SPONGE, swap ETH, MATIC or USDT or make a bank card purchase. Buying $SPONGE through our widget will automatically stake your tokens and start earning you rewards.
buy_stake_para_4: The more tokens you stake, and for longer, the more rewards you’ll earn. You can check your rewards on the staking dashboard.
not_enough_eth: WANT TO STAKE YOUR $SPONGE? CLICK HERE
low_gas_fees: You do not have enough {{modeName}} to pay for this transaction.
buy_widget_head: BUY AND STAKE TO EARN SPONGE V2 WITH {{stakePercent}}% REWARDS!
buy_widget_para: We’re bridging from V1 to V2! Stake your $SPONGE today to earn Sponge V2 tokens. Buy and stake now for a special V2 token bonus!
swap_error: Make sure you have {{gasFees}} {{modeName}} for gas and {{tokenName}} for the token exchange.
low_usdt: You do not have enough USDT to pay for this transaction.
wert_mount_desc: Please wait while we are initializing the Wert widget.
wert_disclaimer: By continuing, you're purchasing and staking {{token}} tokens. The V1 tokens will never be able to be claimed, and are locked forever allowing you to earn SPONGE V2. You'll be able to claim SPONGE V2 on the claim date that will be announced at a later date. After you claim your SPONGE V2, it will be deposited to your wallet.
gas_fees: {{gasFees}} {{modeName}} is reserved for gas. The actual amount used will depend on the network.
transction_info: {{baseToken}} {{cryptoName}} tokens will be available for you to claim once the presale ends.
waiting_approve: In order to buy {{cryptoName}} with USDT, you first need to authorize us to access the USDT in your wallet.
view_transaction_info: Please click on the View Transaction button for more details.
waiting_confirm: In order to buy {{cryptoName}} with {{tokenName}}, please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
max_token_exceed: All of the available SPONGE has been sold and staked. Please check Uniswap for available SPONGE token, and keep an eye out for the V2 launch date.
achive_list_5: 30k Social Followers in a Number of Days
banner_launching_info_2: Now's your chance to buy SPONGE V2!
banner_launching_info_3: Launching on Bigger and Better Exchanges!
buy_widget_title: Last chance to buy SPONGE V2 before exchange listings
install_app: Scan the appropriate QR code below on your mobile device in order to install the Best Wallet app.
already_have: Already got the Best Wallet app?
hit_btn_connect: Hit the button below and use the QR code scanner in the Best Wallet app in order to connect.
connect_bw_btn: Connect with Best Wallet for {{reward}}% Rewards
sticky_notice: $SPONGE V1 is now discontinued. You can now buy and stake V2 tokens. Any V1 holders will be able to stake their tokens in the new contract soon.
stake_popup_para: Direct staking is only available on the Polygon network. If you have purchased $SPONGE on Polygon, you can stake here. Any balance that shows will be the $SPONGE tokens you own on Polygon. Ethereum staking is only available via the ‘BUY AND STAKE’ function on the homepage.
switchNetwork: Switching Chain Failed. Please try to switch to chain {{chain_name}} manually.
we_bridged: We’ve bridged from V1 to V2. Stake your $SPONGE today to earn rewards as Sponge V2 tokens.
eth_popup_para: $SPONGE staking rewards on Ethereum are distributed at a rate of 6149 $SPONGE per ETH block. If you’ve staked on Ethereum you will receive this reward rate.
poly_popup_para: $SPONGE staking rewards on Polygon are distributed at a rate of 300 $SPONGE per POLY block. If you’ve staked on Polygon you will receive this reward rate.
